website_summaries.verdict: Stable balance ball chair that has a prominent backrest to provide the kind of support many people want.
pros: Sturdy chair frame that ships with a 52-centimeter balance ball, which you can remove for workouts away from the desk
Made to fit people between 5-foot and 5-foot 11
Chair ships with four casters on the legs so you can move around more easily
cons: Backrest has a forward lean that some people will find uncomfortable
Chair sits really low to the ground

customer_reviews.title: Better than a standard desk chair
customer_reviews.text: I sat on it all day today and it not only helped to straighten my posture, but use my core muscles ever so slightly (without being uncomfortable). I could definitely feel the difference between this and a standard desk chair, although the back is a little flimsy (wouldn't trust actually leaning back with much weight).
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. I've had the chair for about a month and my lower back feels so much better. I can once again start doing my yoga which I haven't been able to do for about 3 years due to the pain in my back. I do sit all day at work. I'm 6'1" it was a little short so i bought the leg extenders, they fit perfect. Also there are two locking wheels which I hate. I was always hitting the wheel locks. So I went to the hardware store and bought replacement wheels, and now I'm free wheeling.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Ray

customer_reviews.title: A Very Powerful Tool
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best and most helpful tool I could of ever bought for my office. This chair is awesome! It's healthy, its green, its fun, yet efficient.. I use this chair for when I'm programming software for long sessions and I want to feel in tune with the process. If you are a big gamer this chair can also help alot, it keeps you on your toes. This best part about this chair is that it makes your body keep balance which keeps blood moving throughout your entire body, which means better blood flow to your brain which means better ideas and quicker reflexes..
customer_reviews.author: Braxton

customer_reviews.title: Happy with  purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy! I brought it in to work and 3 other coworkers tried to take it from me! I actually let one use it for a few days avd she’s going to buy one. The only downside for me is I’m only 5ft tall so it’s too short to use it during patient care. It’s home now and I use it at the computer. Definitely makes a difference in posture & and digital wellness.
customer_reviews.author: Zorra

customer_reviews.title: Almost useless . . .
customer_reviews.text: The frame is fine, but the ball sent with it was too small to use--it was more like a "beach" ball for playing, not for sitting on.
customer_reviews.author: PofOhio

customer_reviews.title: and am having much better luck with that
customer_reviews.text: This was way too short for me, even with buying and adding the extenders. I am 5'9". It was very uncomfortable, and actually hurt my back from sitting on it. Also, the ball was totally misshapen. I ended up just buying a regular exercise ball, and am having much better luck with that. This chair was a complete waste of money, as the seller does not accept returns.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: I like the chair and after taking a while to pump ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair and after taking a while to pump it up, I used it! I will have to try it again due to the fact that the next day my back hurt. I can't tell if it was from the chair or something else I did. I sit up straight while on it, so maybe it was something else. I'm not as flexible as I used to be, so may not be doing some of the exercises shown on the flier! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Eileen B

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and already helping tone up. placed a sheepskin rug on top of ball and very comfortable to sit on without the moisture build up the rubber ball alone can sometimes give you. Works great with q short foot stool for another way to switch positions as you automatically engage your core.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great for posture and improving core strength!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as a Christmas present last year and have been using it ever since at work. It has improved my posture and core strength and is well-made. After reading reviews that it was too short I did order the risers to go with it, but returned them because it wasn't too short for me. I am 5'6" and with the risers it was way too tall.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of three

customer_reviews.title: This chair is super comfortable and portable and reminds you to stay fit
customer_reviews.text: This chair is super comfortable and portable and reminds you to stay fit. I love it. Never get stressed no matter how long I sit. Others have used it and liked it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sidonie

customer_reviews.title: Liked the idea of thus chair
customer_reviews.text: Liked the idea of thus chair, however, it does not appear to be height adjustable, and I am on the shorter side side it's too short for me to use at my desk. Also, the air slowly leaks out. Tried to return but this item not eligible for return
customer_reviews.author: Tari

customer_reviews.title: Better back
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this fit chair at work for the past month and my back has never been better. Helps with your core muscles. Find I don't slouch when sitting in a regular chair. Do advise getting the 2" height extenders for better comfort at a desk.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaB

customer_reviews.title: Received on schedule and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Received on schedule and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Took some getting used to but definitely see results in my overall posture
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: It went together easily and meets all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived the next day and was as expected. It went together easily and meets all my expectations. The extenders were not actually needed to acquire the proper desk height but the chair is more comfortable to sit in with them attached. Great product and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! I have a back injury due to a car accident and normal chairs make my back hurt. I'm also on my feet a good portion of the day. This chair changed how I feel on a daily basis. It was easy to put together and works well for an office chair. My office mates want one for their own!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Swenson

customer_reviews.title: The Price is Right!
customer_reviews.text: worth every penny. definitely helps my SI, hip, and low back pain.
customer_reviews.author: leanna blue

customer_reviews.title: posture improved sitting on it. Only have to refill ...
customer_reviews.text: posture improved sitting on it. Only have to refill every 2 weeks, Only gripe is seat heat up when sit on too long
customer_reviews.author: good

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair. It's so comfortable. I can stretch out and my back and legs don't hurt!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Use this at my office. Do not over inflate or your bottom will be sore for days. haha. Easy to assemble and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Rios

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this product so far! Easy to assemble and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Stark

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This is NOTHING like the picture, you sit like a child height in the chair, the ball is soooooo small not like the picture. The chair does not roll around like a chair does. So unhappy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki D.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: The item came quickly and was just as advertised. It is comfortable for sitting too so I don't mind working out with it.
customer_reviews.author: JANINE S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: satisfied. Would like to have a ball that doesnt deflate but thats not something that will stop me from repurchasing
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: The chair is very comfortable and it helps to keep my back straight while ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very comfortable and it helps to keep my back straight while I'm at my desk. Great for my posture and chronic back problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has wheel stoppers to move around desk area and tons my cores while working
customer_reviews.text: Sat on this all day long and feel so much relief from back strain. I have girls at work asking me to try it out, but I can’t part with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the benefits of the chair
customer_reviews.text: Love the benefits of the chair, makes me sit up straighter, no longer go home form work with a back ache. However, the one downfall, is it maneuvers terribly over the commercial carpet in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Evoy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I use a flexible seating seating in my classroom and my students absolutely love this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal shopper

customer_reviews.title: The chair is great, but I was looking for something that is ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair is great, but I was looking for something that is a little more work to sit on. This was rather easy to stabilize yourself and required very little core work. It helped my posture only a little. But I ended up just taking the ball out of the chair and sitting on that. Loved the ball!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! I'm 5' 7" and its the perfect height for me. (It would easily work for someone taller just by adding more air to the ball). My back feels much better when using this chair as it forces me to have correct posture.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product came as advertised in everyway except for the ball retaining bar 1/4 threaded ends which poked through the package and was danging out through the box. I wonder how the UPS guy wasn't tempted to lose it. It was also a poking hazard. If you are interested in seeing the picture I took one prior to opening the box just in case other items were missing also. Turns out only the black paint was damaged on the retainer, otherwise everything else was okay. I would give it a 5 stars if the package problem didn't happen, because the price of $72.00 is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Dell

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, everything was great quality, and most importantly it was super comfortable for my 5'5" wife.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend it to anyone considering
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my mother and she enjoys it in her office. Definitely recommend it to anyone considering
customer_reviews.author: David Davis Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this chair. Improves your posture and force yourself to sit straight.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair. I think over time it will help my posture and core!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Missing plug for ball!
customer_reviews.text: Can't even try the chair, as it was received without a plug for the ball!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair so much. Very comfortable. I would love to replace my chair at work with this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no regrets
customer_reviews.text: Very stable. Ball stays inflated and i get to work out all day while working.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Crane

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Really feel it in my legs. Got it to help me make sure I'm sitting up straight during the day, and it's working.
customer_reviews.author: LMMK

customer_reviews.title: This chair is the best! There are four of us in my office ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is the best! There are four of us in my office that have gotten this chair and what a difference it has made in my lower back and legs after sitting at my desk all day! Fun to bounce to music on the radio as well - makes the day a bit happier!
customer_reviews.author: Karen P. Fate

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The metal ban that holds the ball in place was missing
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but not as comfortable as the ball itself
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: so it cannot be used comfortably with a desk
customer_reviews.text: The materials are not very exciting, the manual is poorly printed, and the chair is also very low, so it cannot be used comfortably with a desk, unless you buy add-on height extenders provided by the same company at $10 extra. Bottom line: love the concept, but this particular implementation is not very good
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan Fazlyev

customer_reviews.title: Great product, perfect for my office!
customer_reviews.text: After putting off buying one of these chairs for a long time, I finally purchased one for my office earlier this year, and couldn't be happier that I did. This is the perfect office chair for me, and I spend a lot of time sitting. I'm 5'7" and the height is just right for me. My back and body are happier than they've ever been sitting in a traditional office chair. Great product, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great for your back and abs when you are at a desk all day for your job!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Ball chair
customer_reviews.text: Love my bouncy chair. Had to buy one for work too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced for cheap construction might as well just buy a big excersice ball
customer_reviews.author: harley

customer_reviews.title: Smart purchase on my part!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this chair about 3 days ago and the little time I use it, I feel great! I'm glad I bought the leg extinctions, but wonder if I should get a 65inch ball. Great price and so excited to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Reatha M. Gooden

customer_reviews.title: This is a gift for my wife and she really ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my wife and she really enjoys the benefits of having a place to keep her exercise ball and the benefits to her posture this type of chair adds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, lightweight, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I work 10 hour long days at the computer at home; this is the most comfortable chair I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: drt

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed the product the ball deflated after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this item for a Christmas gift. I really liked the product until it deflated about 2 days after the return policy was up (30 days). In other words, the ball is cheap and will spring a leak shortly after you cant return the product. I contacted the seller but received no response.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Beardslee

customer_reviews.title: No Valve Cap
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, except for the ball. There was no way to close off the valve once it was inflated. Had to use an old ball I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Gal

customer_reviews.title: This is a great chair. Even better than I thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair. Even better than I thought it would be after reading many reviews. Arrived quickly and was easy to set up. I recommend this seller and this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Hernandez family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture. Arrived quickly! World recommend to a friend! I bought as a gift, and it is used daily.
customer_reviews.author: flynne62

customer_reviews.title: I am practicing wellness this yea and as a teacher ...
customer_reviews.text: I am practicing wellness this yea and as a teacher this chair really helps take the pressure off of my back.
customer_reviews.author: Skripter

customer_reviews.title: posture helper
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work (CSR teller) great for posture and much more comfortable than a chair!
customer_reviews.author: tkroll34

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Ball
customer_reviews.text: The ball is of very low quality and popped after a couple weeks. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected, weak back, to low for a desk, table, or any other normal seated surface.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Amelsberg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for over 10 years - sent one to my son-in-law for his birthday. Hope it works out for him.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbygrandma

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT PURCHASE FROM AMAZON EVER AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks, the balance ball sprung a leak at the seam after 3-4 months of office use. Amazon said not our problem to contact the manufacturer, but they don't have a number for the manufacturer per the poorly English speaking person at the customer service department at amazon. I asked for an American service rep, he would not transfer me, I asked for a supervisor they had me on hold for about 30 minutes, still not an American person, talked to the non English speaking supper visor he was unable to help, was going send me to another person which was still not an American. We really need American people working at American companies.
customer_reviews.author: Imad Hermez

customer_reviews.title: No plug.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped, opened, assembled and no plug for the yoga ball.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

product_meta.title: Sivan Health and Fitness Balance Fit Chair, Black
product_meta.description: Stretch, prevent spine disorders, and correct posture with the Sivan Health and Fitness Balance Fit Chair. Featuring a sturdy base designed with four rolling wheels - two locking - this is the perfect chair for the home or office. Acts as a shock absorber while you are seated to help ease your body into an ergonomic position for improved posture. Rolling base features 4 rolling wheels - 2 are lockable. Use to stretch, correct posture, reduce stiffness, improve circulation. . Eases body into an ergonomic position. Dimensions: 31L x 21W x 22H inches. Manufacture recommends sitting low ,as it is better for your back, but for people who prefer sitting higher for example sitting by a higher desk or just taller people, Look out for Manufactures height extenders, or you could replace the ball with a bigger ball.
feature_bullets: Created by leading health and fitness experts to improve your back health
Employs the same balance ball used in your workout routine
Helps build a healthier back, align the spine, relieve pain, and improve your overall well-being
Includes removable 52-centimeter Balance Ball, an adjustable support bar, easy-glide casters, air pump

Designed for users 5-feet to 5-feet, 11-inches tall; 300-pound weight capacityNote: for optimal performance, it may be necessary to re-inflate your new Balance Ball once or twice after the initial inflation
